pre_caption: The video presents a wide shot of a cartoonish graveyard, with the camera initially positioned above the foreground elements. A castle is visible in the background at the top center, while gnarled trees occupy the left and right foreground and middle ground. Various stone tombstones are scattered across the middle ground, with a wooden fence to the middle ground left and a faintly glowing lantern in the middle ground center-right. In the foreground, a large, upright bread-shaped tombstone stands left of center, near two smaller, flat bread slices lying on the ground—one in the center-left and another in the center-right. These two foreground bread slices then animate, standing upright with glowing red eyes in their respective positions, as a third similar animated figure emerges from behind the large bread-tombstone in the left-center foreground. Simultaneously, the camera's height adjusts to be more at the level of these animated subjects.
